Sentencas: This work presents an innovative model-based approach for the development of mathematical transfer functions capable of correlating Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs) degradation rate to the applied operating conditions.
Titulo: Development of mathematical transfer functions correlating Solid Oxide Fuel Cell degradation to operating conditions for Accelerated Stress Test protocols design

Sentencas: Such functions can be used for fuel cell lifetime prediction and Accelerated Stress Test (AST) protocols design.
Titulo: Development of mathematical transfer functions correlating Solid Oxide Fuel Cell degradation to operating conditions for Accelerated Stress Test protocols design

Sentencas: The proposed approach relies on multiscale modelling methodology and links local degradation to high level per-formance models to evaluate the key operating variables accelerating voltage decay over time.
Titulo: Development of mathematical transfer functions correlating Solid Oxide Fuel Cell degradation to operating conditions for Accelerated Stress Test protocols design

Sentencas: A thorough simulation analysis is performed to convey the correlation among operating variables and degradation rate into mathematical transfer functions.
Titulo: Development of mathematical transfer functions correlating Solid Oxide Fuel Cell degradation to operating conditions for Accelerated Stress Test protocols design

Sentencas: To better illustrate the overall design and application process of such functions, a case study accounting for Ni agglomeration is addressed.
Titulo: Development of mathematical transfer functions correlating Solid Oxide Fuel Cell degradation to operating conditions for Accelerated Stress Test protocols design

Sentencas: The multiscale modelling framework is applied to correlate microscale (i.e., Ni particles size change) and macroscale (i.e., SOFC voltage reduction) levels through the most affected mesoscale parameters.
Titulo: Development of mathematical transfer functions correlating Solid Oxide Fuel Cell degradation to operating conditions for Accelerated Stress Test protocols design

Sentencas: The model is then used to simulate voltage decay over time and link degradation rates to the applied operating conditions.
Titulo: Development of mathematical transfer functions correlating Solid Oxide Fuel Cell degradation to operating conditions for Accelerated Stress Test protocols design

Sentencas: Afterwards, a parametric analysis is performed to inves-tigate the influence exerted by each operating variable on the degradation rate and derive the transfer functions.
Titulo: Development of mathematical transfer functions correlating Solid Oxide Fuel Cell degradation to operating conditions for Accelerated Stress Test protocols design

Sentencas: An example of application for Accelerated Stress Test (AST) protocols design is then given.
Titulo: Development of mathematical transfer functions correlating Solid Oxide Fuel Cell degradation to operating conditions for Accelerated Stress Test protocols design
